text: Cedius is a genus of ant-loving beetles in the family Staphylinidae. There are at least three described species in Cedius. ==Species== * Cedius cruralis Park, 1949 * Cedius spinosus LeConte, 1849 * Cedius ziegleri LeConte, 1849 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * Category:Pselaphitae
title: Cedius
